verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David בְּךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> In thee O LORD חָ֭סִיתִי <WH2620> do I put my trust אַל־ <WH408> nay אֵב֣וֹשָׁה <WH954> be ashamed לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> In בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> me in thy righteousness פַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <WH6403> deliver

הַטֵּ֤ה <WH5186> Bow down אֵלַ֨י ׀ <WH413> about אָזְנְךָ֮ <WH241> thine ear מְהֵרָ֪ה <WH4120> me speedily הַצִּ֫ילֵ֥נִי <WH5337> to me deliver הֱיֵ֤ה <WH1961> become לִ֨י ׀ לְֽצוּר־ <WH6697> rock מָ֭עוֹז <WH4581> be thou my strong לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for an house מְצוּד֗וֹת <WH4686> of defence לְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> to save

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for סַלְעִ֣י <WH5553> For thou [art] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י <WH4686> and my fortress אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you וּלְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> sake שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> therefore for thy name's תַּֽנְחֵ֥נִי <WH5148> sake lead וּֽתְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ <WH5095> me and guide

תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נִי <WH3318> Pull me out מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> of the net ז֭וּ <WH2098> that טָ֣מְנוּ <WH2934> they have laid privily לִ֑י כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַ֝תָּה <WH859> You מָֽעוּזִּֽי׃ <WH4581> for me for thou [art] my strength

בְּיָדְךָ֮ <WH3027> Into thine hand אַפְקִ֪יד <WH6485> I commit ר֫וּחִ֥י <WH7307> my spirit פָּדִ֖יתָה <WH6299> thou hast redeemed אוֹתִ֥י <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> me O LORD אֵ֣ל <WH410> God אֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> of truth

שָׂנֵ֗אתִי <WH8130> I have hated הַשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> them that regard הַבְלֵי־ <WH1892> vanities שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> lying וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I אֶל־ <WH413> in יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> in the LORD בָּטָֽחְתִּי׃ <WH982> but I trust

אָגִ֥ילָה <WH1523> I will be glad וְאֶשְׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8055> and rejoice בְּחַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH2617> in thy mercy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Because רָ֭אִיתָ <WH7200> for thou hast considered אֶת־ <WH853> עָנְיִ֑י <WH6040> my trouble יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> thou hast known בְּצָר֥וֹת <WH6869> in adversities נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> have not הִ֭סְגַּרְתַּנִי <WH5462> And hast not shut me up בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אוֹיֵ֑ב <WH341> of the enemy הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתָּ <WH5975> thou hast set בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב <WH4800> in a large room רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> my feet

חָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> Have mercy יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> upon me O LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> I am in צַ֫ר־ <WH6887> for I am in trouble לִ֥י עָשְׁשָׁ֖ה <WH6244> is consumed בְכַ֥עַס <WH3708> with grief עֵינִ֗י <WH5869> mine eye נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> [yea] my soul וּבִטְנִֽי׃ <WH990> and my belly

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for כָל֪וּ <WH3615> is spent בְיָג֡וֹן <WH3015> with grief חַיַּי֮ <WH2416> For my life וּשְׁנוֹתַ֪י <WH8141> and my years בַּאֲנָ֫חָ֥ה <WH585> with sighing כָּשַׁ֣ל <WH3782> faileth בַּעֲוֹנִ֣י <WH5771> because of mine iniquity כֹחִ֑י <WH3581> my strength וַעֲצָמַ֥י <WH6106> and my bones עָשֵֽׁשׁוּ׃ <WH6244> are consumed

מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all צֹרְרַ֨י <WH6887> among all mine enemies הָיִ֪יתִי <WH1961> have become חֶרְפָּ֡ה <WH2781> I was a reproach וְלִשֲׁכֵנַ֨י ׀ <WH7934> among my neighbours מְאֹד֮ <WH3966> but especially וּפַ֪חַד <WH6343> and a fear לִֽמְיֻדָּ֫עָ֥י <WH3045> to mine acquaintance רֹאַ֥י <WH7200> they that did see בַּח֑וּץ <WH2351> me without נָדְד֥וּ <WH5074> fled מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> Because
נִ֭שְׁכַּחְתִּי <WH7911> I am forgotten כְּמֵ֣ת <WH4191> as a dead man מִלֵּ֑ב <WH3820> out of mind הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <WH1961> I am כִּכְלִ֥י <WH3627> vessel אֹבֵֽד׃ <WH6> I am like a broken

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֨עְתִּי ׀ <WH8085> For I have heard דִּבַּ֥ת <WH1681> the slander רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> of many מָג֪וֹר <WH4032> fear מִסָּ֫בִ֥יב <WH5439> [was] on every side בְּהִוָּסְדָ֣ם <WH3245> while they took counsel יַ֣חַד <WH3162> together עָלַ֑י <WH5921> against לָקַ֖חַת <WH3947> to take away נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> my life זָמָֽמוּ׃ <WH2161> against me they devised
וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> and בָטַ֣חְתִּי <WH982> But I trusted יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in thee O LORD אָ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> I said אֱלֹהַ֥י <WH430> Thou [art] my God אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

בְּיָדְךָ֥ <WH3027> [are] in thy hand עִתֹּתָ֑י <WH6256> My times הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי <WH5337> deliver מִיַּד־ <WH3027> me from the hand א֝וֹיְבַ֗י <WH341> of mine enemies וּמֵרֹדְפָֽי׃ <WH7291> and from them that persecute
הָאִ֣ירָה <WH215> to shine פָ֭נֶיךָ <WH6440> Make thy face עַל־ <WH5921> upon עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> upon thy servant ה֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> save בְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> me for thy mercies'

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אַל־ <WH408> nay אֵ֭בוֹשָׁה <WH954> Let me not be ashamed כִּ֣י <WH3588> for קְרָאתִ֑יךָ <WH7121> for I have called יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> be ashamed רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> upon thee let the wicked יִדְּמ֥וּ <WH1826> [and] let them be silent לִשְׁאֽוֹל׃ <WH7585> in the grave

תֵּ֥אָלַ֗מְנָה <WH481> be put to silence שִׂפְתֵ֫י <WH8193> lips שָׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> Let the lying הַדֹּבְר֖וֹת <WH1696> which speak עַל־ <WH5921> against צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> against the righteous עָתָ֗ק <WH6277> grievous בְּגַאֲוָ֥ה <WH1346> things proudly וָבֽוּז׃ <WH937> and contemptuously

מָ֤ה <WH4100> How רַֽב־ <WH7227> [Oh] how great טוּבְךָ֮ <WH2898> [is] thy goodness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which צָפַ֪נְתָּ <WH6845> which thou hast laid up לִּֽירֵ֫אֶ֥יךָ <WH3373> for them that fear פָּ֭עַלְתָּ <WH6466> thee [which] thou hast wrought לַחֹסִ֣ים <WH2620> for them that trust בָּ֑ךְ נֶ֝֗גֶד <WH5048> about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> in thee before the sons אָדָם׃ <WH120> of men

תַּסְתִּירֵ֤ם ׀ <WH5641> Thou shalt hide בְּסֵ֥תֶר <WH5643> them in the secret פָּנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> of thy presence מֵֽרֻכְסֵ֫י <WH7407> from the pride אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> of man תִּצְפְּנֵ֥ם <WH6845> thou shalt keep them secretly בְּסֻכָּ֗ה <WH5521> in a pavilion מֵרִ֥יב <WH7379> from the strife לְשֹׁנֽוֹת׃ <WH3956> of tongues

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִפְלִ֘יא <WH6381> for he hath shewed me his marvellous חַסְדּ֥וֹ <WH2617> kindness לִ֝֗י בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> city מָצֽוֹר׃ <WH4692> in a strong

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I אָ֘מַ֤רְתִּי <WH559> For I said בְחָפְזִ֗י <WH2648> in my haste נִגְרַזְתִּי֮ <WH1629> I am cut off מִנֶּ֪גֶד <WH5048> from before עֵ֫ינֶ֥יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes אָכֵ֗ן <WH403> nevertheless שָׁ֭מַעְתָּ <WH8085> thou heardest ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice תַּחֲנוּנַ֗י <WH8469> of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֥י <WH7768> when I cried אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

אֶֽהֱב֥וּ <WH157> O love אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all חֲסִ֫ידָ֥יו <WH2623> all ye his saints אֱ֭מוּנִים <WH539> the faithful נֹצֵ֣ר <WH5341> preserveth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [for] the LORD וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <WH7999> rewardeth עַל־ <WH5921> and יֶ֝֗תֶר <WH3499> and plentifully עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> doer גַאֲוָֽה׃ <WH1346> the proud

חִ֭זְקוּ <WH2388> Be of good courage וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ <WH553> and he shall strengthen לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <WH3824> your heart כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַ֝מְיַחֲלִ֗ים <WH3176> all ye that hope לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD
